TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CodeDomSerializerBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 类提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用作和类之间的共享基 。The class is used as a shared base between the and classes. 公共 类派生自 类。Public classes derive from the class. 每个公共类定义自己的公共 API。Each public class defines its own public API. 类不定义公共 API，但提供了许多可用于帮助序列化过程的实用工具方法。The class defines no public API, but does offer a multitude of utility methods that can be used to aid the serialization process.

The to interpret.

summary.span: 将给定表达式反序列化为内存中的对象。

span.span: Deserializes the given expression into an in-memory object.

returns.span: 从 的解释生成的对象。

span.span: An object resulting from interpretation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个帮助器方法，派生类可以调用该方法对表达式进行反序列化。This is a helper method that derived classes can call to deserialize an expression. 它通过解释并执行参数指定的 CodeDOM 表达式，对语句进行反序列化 `expression` ，然后返回结果。It deserializes the statement by interpreting and executing the CodeDOM expression specified by the `expression` parameter, and then returns the results. 如果需要创建一个对象作为此表达式的结果，则会为其指定参数指定的名称 `name` 。If an object needs to be created as a result of this expression, it will be given the name specified by the `name` parameter. `null`如果不需要为对象命名，则名称可以为。The name can be `null` if there is no need to name the object. 下表描述了如何处理特定表达式。The following table describes how specific expressions are handled. |表达式Expression|行为Behavior| |----------------|--------------| ||此表达式表示 `this` 或 `Me` 。This expression represents `this` or `Me`. 若要查找与此表达式关联的对象，该 方法将在的上下文堆栈中查找 。To locate the object that is associated with this expression, the method will look in the context stack for a . 此对象包含关系图的根对象和表示它的表达式。This object contains the root object of the graph and the expression that represents it. 如果对象存在并且表达式匹配，则将返回根对象。If the object is present and the expression matches, the root object will be returned. 如果找不到实例，则会报告错误。An error is reported if an instance cannot be located.| ||如果字段引用的目标计算为根对象，则 manager 参数的方法将用于根据名称检索对象实例。If the target of the field reference evaluates to the root object, the method of the manager parameter will be used to retrieve the object instance based on name. 否则，将针对目标对象使用标准反射来定位请求的字段。Otherwise, standard reflection is used against the target object to locate the requested field. 如果找不到该字段，则会报告错误。An error is reported if the field cannot be located.| ||参数的方法 `manager` 用于查找表示给定变量名称的实例。The method of the `manager` parameter is used to locate the instance representing the given variable name. 如果找不到实例，则会报告错误。An error is reported if an instance cannot be located.| 继续解释表达式，直到它们完全解析为某个对象，或者直到它不能再化简表达式。 continues to interpret expressions until they are completely resolved to an object, or until it can no longer simplify the expression. 在这种情况下， 将返回一个 ，其中包含最简化的表达式。In this case, will return a that contains the most simplified expression. 不支持以下表达式：The following expressions are not supported: - - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 反序列化过程中调用方法以获取对象的实例。The method is invoked during deserialization to obtain an instance of an object. 调用此时，应返回所请求类型的实例。When this is called, an instance of the requested type should be returned. 默认实现将调用 参数的方法 `manager` 。The default implementation invokes the method of the `manager` parameter.

span.span: The to use for serialization.

param.name: value
param.span: 要从其中对属性进行反序列化的对象。

span.span: The object from which the properties are to be deserialized.

param.name: filter
param.span: 筛选将反序列化哪些属性的 数组。

span.span: An array that filters which properties will be deserialized.

summary.span: 在给定对象上将属性从固定区域性资源包反序列化。

span.span: Deserializes properties on the given object from the invariant culture's resource bundle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是派生类可调用的帮助器方法。The method is a helper method that derived classes can call. 它查找给定对象上的属性，并尝试从固定区域性的资源包中加载其值。It looks for properties on the given object and attempts to load their values out of the invariant culture's resource bundle. 这通常用于处理未发出到源代码中的设计时属性。This is generally used to handle design-time properties that are not emitted into source code. 它不应用于已本地化的属性，因为它仅在固定区域性上操作。It should not be used for localized properties because it only operates on the invariant culture. 此方法检查 `value` 与参数指定的特性匹配的参数的所有属性 `filter` ，然后在资源二进制对象中检查这些属性。This method inspects all of the properties of the `value` parameter that match the attributes specified by the `filter` parameter, and then checks for those properties in a resource binary object. 这对于反序列化无法在代码中表示的属性（如设计时属性）很有用。This is useful for deserializing properties that cannot be represented in code, such as design-time properties. 此方法要求设计器加载程序提供 读取资源的。This method requires that a designer loader offers an to read resources. 如果 为固定区域性提供，则 将从 XML 资源 ( .resx) 文件的元数据部分读取资源，最终编译的代码中未包含此内容。If the provides a for the invariant culture, then will read resources from the XML resource (.resx) file's metadata section, which is not included in final compiled code. 如果该服务不可用，将不会读取任何资源。If this service is not available, no resources will be read.

param.span: 要为其获取表达式的对象。

span.span: The object for which to get an expression.

summary.span: 返回给定对象的表达式。

span.span: Returns an expression for the given object.

returns.span: 表示 的 ，或者，如果没有 的现有表达式，则为 。

span.span: A representing , or if there is no existing expression for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回表示给定对象的表达式。The method returns an expression representing the given object. 它可以返回 `null` ，指示未设置描述对象的表达式。It can return `null`, indicating that no expression has been set that describes the object. 表达式是通过以下三种方式之一获得的：Expressions are acquired in one of three ways: - 此表达式可能是先前调用方法所得的结果 。The expression could be the result of a prior call to the method. - 可以在中找到表达式 。The expression could have been found in the . - 表达式可以通过派生 。The expression could be derived through . 若要通过派生表达式 ， 方法将在引用服务中查询给定对象的名称。To derive expressions through , the method queries the reference service for a name for the given object. 如果表达式服务返回有效的名称， 则该 方法将检查名称中是否存在 "."。If the expression service returns a valid name, , the method checks to see if there is a "." in the name. 这表示表达式服务找到此对象作为另一个对象的只读属性的返回值。This indicates that the expression service found this object as the return value of a read-only property on another object. 如果有 "."，则 会将引用拆分为各个部分。If there is a ".", will split the reference into parts. 最左边的部分是将使用方法进行计算的名称 。The leftmost part is a name that will be evaluated with the method. 对于每个后续部分，将生成一个属性引用表达式。For each subsequent part, a property reference expression will be built. 然后，将返回最后一个表达式。The final expression will then be returned. 如果对象未设置表达式，或者如果在引用服务中找不到该对象， 则将返回 `null` ，指示该对象没有现有表达式。If the object did not have an expression set, or if the object was not found in the reference service, will return `null`, indicating there is no existing expression for the object.

A that is appropriate for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是方法的扩展 。The method is an extension to the method. 方法采用对象类型，而不是对象值。The method takes an object type, rather than an object value. 如果外部方通过了重写特定对象的元数据 ，则方法将不会显示元数据重写 ，该方法只采用类型。If an external party had overridden metadata for a specific object through , that metadata override would not be seen by the method, which only takes a type. 方法检查值的元数据和值的类型。The method checks the metadata of the value and the value's type. 如果这两个不同， 将查看是否存在值的自定义设计器序列化程序特性。If the two differ, will look to see if there is a custom designer serializer attribute on the value. 如果是， 将尝试使用它。If so, will attempt to use it. 否则，它将延迟为 。Otherwise, it will defer to .

span.span: or is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，派生类可以调用该方法将单个事件序列化为给定的 。The method is a helper method that derived classes can call to serialize a single event into the given . 查询的序列化管理器以获取 给定事件的，然后请求 对其进行序列化。 queries the serialization manager for a for the given event, and then asks the to serialize it. 将 `statements` 和 `descriptor` 参数置于上 。 places the `statements` and `descriptor` parameters on the . 需要一个 来发现未编译的方法的事件绑定。 requires an to discover event bindings to methods that are not compiled. 如果此服务不存在，则不会写入到非编译方法的事件绑定。If this service is not present, event bindings to non-compiled methods will not be written. 如果事件绑定到的对象可以转换为表达式，则仍将序列化事件绑定到已编译方法。Event bindings to compiled methods will still be serialized if the objects to which the events are bound can be converted into expressions.

span.span: Serializes the properties on the given object into the invariant culture's resource bundle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是派生类可调用的帮助器方法。The method is a helper method that derived classes can call. 它查看 `value` 与参数匹配的参数的属性 `filter` ，然后将属性序列化为固定区域性资源包。It looks at properties on the `value` parameter that match the `filter` parameter, and then it serializes the properties into the invariant culture resource bundle. 如果资源服务返回 ，则属性值将存储在 XML 资源 ( .resx) 文件的元数据部分。If the resource service returns a , the property values will be stored in the metadata section of the XML resource (.resx) file. `statements`未使用参数。The `statements` parameter is not used. 若要将序列化为资源，属性必须是简单的 (不是内容属性) 并且其值必须可序列化。To be serialized as a resource, a property must be simple (not a content property) and its value must be serializable. 不符合此模式的属性将被跳过。Properties that do not conform to this pattern will be skipped. 需要 获取以 写入固定区域性的资源。 requires an to obtain a to write resources for the invariant culture. 如果该服务不可用，将不会写入任何资源。If this service is not available, no resources will be written.

summary.span: 将给定对象序列化为使用给定资源名称的资源包。

span.span: Serializes the given object into a resource bundle using the given resource name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，它将值序列化为具有给定名称的资源包。The method is a helper method that serializes a value to a resource bundle under the given name. 写入资源的区域性是通过在序列化管理器的集合中搜索名为的属性来确定的 `ResourceCulture` 。The culture that the resource is written to is determined by searching the serialization manager's collection for a property called `ResourceCulture`. 如果该属性存在，则会将资源写入该区域性。If this property exists, resources will be written to that culture. 否则，资源将写入固定区域性。Otherwise, resources will be written to the invariant culture. `value`参数必须可序列化。The `value` parameter must be serializable. 需要 获取以 写入正确区域性的资源。 requires an to obtain a to write resources for the correct culture. 如果该服务不可用， 将改为在表示资源的代码中生成二进制对象。If this service is not available, will instead build a binary object in code that represents the resource.

para.span: 是读写属性，可通过序列化管理器的集合进行访问 。

span.span: is a read-write property that is accessed through the serialization manager's collection.

para.span: 方法从不更改此属性的值; 它只是读取它来标识它将写入的区域性。

span.span: The method never changes the value of this property; it merely reads it to identify the culture to which it will write.

para.span: 在反序列化过程中，将在分析和加载资源时设置属性。

span.span: The property is set during deserialization as resources are parsed and loaded.

related.span: 动态源代码生成和编译

span.span: The to use for serialization.
The object to serialize.
Can be .

summary.span: 将给定对象序列化为表达式。

span.span: Serializes the given object into an expression.

returns.span: 如果 可以序列化，则为 对象；否则为 。

span.span: A object if can be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`参数可以为 `null` ，在这种情况下，将返回基元表达式。The `value` parameter can be `null`, in which case a primitive expression will be returned. 方法使用以下规则来序列化类型：The method uses the following rules for serializing types: 1. 它首先调用 方法，以查看是否已为该对象创建了一个表达式。It first calls the method to see if an expression has already been created for the object. 如果是，则返回现有表达式。If so, it returns the existing expression. 2. 然后，它会定位对象的序列化程序，并要求其序列化。It then locates the object's serializer, and asks it to serialize. 3. 如果对象的序列化程序的返回值为 ，则返回该表达式。If the return value of the object's serializer is a , the expression is returned. 4. 它将最后一次调用 来查看序列化程序是否添加了表达式。It makes one last call to to see if the serializer added an expression. 5. 最后，它将返回 `null` 。Finally, it returns `null`. 如果无法创建任何表达式，并且找不到合适的序列化程序，则将通过序列化管理器报告错误。If no expression could be created and no suitable serializer could be found, an error will be reported through the serialization manager. 如果找到序列化程序，但未能生成表达式，则不会报告任何错误。No error will be reported if a serializer was found but it failed to produce an expression. 在这种情况下，假定序列化程序已报告错误或未尝试序列化对象。In this case, it is assumed that the serializer either already reported the error or it did not attempt to serialize the object. 如果序列化程序返回了语句或语句的集合，则不会丢弃这些语句。If the serializer returned a statement or a collection of statements, those statements will not be discarded. 此 方法将首先 在上下文堆栈上查找，并将语句添加到语句上下文对象的 属性中。The method will first look for a on the context stack and add statements to the statement context object's property. 如果没有任何语句上下文，该 方法将在的上下文中查找 ，并将语句添加到其中。If there is no statement context, the method will look in the context for a and add the statements there. 如果找不到可添加语句的位置，则会生成错误。If no place can be found to add the statements, an error will be generated. > [!NOTE] > 序列化你自己的对象时，不应在中调用方法。You should not call the method within when serializing your own object. 应改为调用 。Instead, you should call . 如果它返回 `null` ，请创建自己的表达式并调用 。If it returns `null`, create your own expression and call . 然后继续执行序列化的其余部分。Then proceed with the rest of your serialization.

span.span: is .

span.span: The to use for serialization.
The object to serialize.

summary.span: 将给定对象序列化为表达式。

span.span: Serializes the given object into an expression.

returns.span: 将 作为序列化的表达式包含在内的 。

span.span: A containing as a serialized expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，它将值序列化为资源表达式。The method is a helper method that serializes a value to a resource expression. 这与方法相对应 ，后者将值写入资源二进制对象。This is in contrast to the method, which writes a value to a resource binary object. 进一步执行，并返回一个可用于恢复资源的表达式。 goes one step further and returns an expression that can be used to recover the resource. 例如，返回值可能是 "rm"。GetValue ( "SomeBitmap" ) ; "。For example, the return value might be "rm.GetValue("SomeBitmap");". 如果可在上下文堆栈上找到资源，则从中计算资源的名称。The name of the resource is calculated from the , if one can be found on the context stack. 方法将查找 以下对象的：The method will look on the for the following objects: - -要将资源管理器添加到其中的语句的集合（如果需要声明一个）。 - a collection of statements to add a resource manager to, if one needs to be declared. - -创建资源管理器所需的根表达式。 - the root expression, which is needed to create a resource manager. - -用于创建资源的名称并决定要进行的资源管理器调用的类型。 - used to fabricate a name for the resource and to decide what type of resource manager call to make.

summary.span: 将给定对象序列化为适合于固定区域性的表达式。

span.span: Serializes the given object into an expression appropriate for the invariant culture.

returns.span: 将 作为序列化的表达式包含在内的 。

span.span: A containing as a serialized expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `ensureInvariant` 参数为 `true` ， 并且当前不 `ResourceCulture` 是固定区域性，则该方法还会将资源值写入固定区域性的资源文件中。If the `ensureInvariant` parameter is `true`, the method will also write the resource value into the invariant culture's resource file if the current `ResourceCulture` is not the invariant culture.

summary.span: 将一个对象与表达式相关联。

span.span: Associates an object with an expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是将与对象关联的帮助器方法 。The method is a helper method that associates a with an object. 通过这种方式与表达式关联的对象可通过方法进行访问 。Objects that have been associated with expressions in this way are accessible through the method. 将其表达式表存储为上下文堆栈上的追加对象，以便任何序列化程序的方法都可以访问它 。 stores its expression table as an appended object on the context stack so it is accessible by any serializer's method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是将与对象关联的帮助器方法 。The method is a helper method that associates a with an object. 通过这种方式与表达式关联的对象可通过方法进行访问 。Objects that have been associated with expressions in this way are accessible through the method. 将 其 expression 表存储为上下文堆栈上的追加对象，以便任何序列化程序的方法都可以访问它 。The stores its expression table as an appended object on the context stack so it is accessible by any serializer's method.
